bobsled package

Submodules

Module contents

The primary class you will instantiate is bobsled.MainClass.BobsledClient. From its methods, you will obtain instances of all Bobsled objects.

bobsled.MainClass module

class src.bobsled.MainClass.BobsledClient(credentials, base_url='http://127.0.0.1:8080')[source]

Bases: object

This is the main class you instantiate to access Bobsled.

class Share(share_id, session, base_url)[source]

Bases: object

This class represents a share, and should only be acquired by the user through calling get_share or create_share on a BobsledClient

class Delivery(delivery_id, share_id, session, base_url)[source]

Bases: object

This class represents a delivery, and should only be acquired by the user through calling get_delivery or create_delivery on a Share

deliver_delivery()[source]

Delivers this Delivery

Calls

POST /shares/{share_id}

edit_delivery()[source]
add_consumer(consumer_email)[source]

Adds a consumer by given email

Calls

POST /shares/{share_id}/team

Parameters

consumer_email – email address of the consumer to be added

change_overview(name, description)[source]

Changes overview text of the share

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/overview

create_delivery(selection)[source]

Creates and returns a Delivery object given selection of file paths

Calls

POST /shares/{share_id}/delivery

Parameters

selection – file paths for files in the source container to be included in this delivery

edit_access_identifiers(ARN_list)[source]

Edit access identifiers of this share

Parameters

ARN_list – list of access identifiers for this share

get_deliveries()[source]

Returns the list of deliveries of this share

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/driver

Returns

list of deliveries

get_destination_locations()[source]

Get destination locations that can be used in set_destination_location

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/destination/new

Returns

something, a list or dictionary of locations, undecided

get_folder_contents()[source]

Returns flattened contents of all files in source location

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/loadCloudData

Returns

list of file paths

get_id()[source]
get_source_locations()[source]

Retrieves and returns location_ids that can be used in set_source_location

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/source

Returns

list of location_ids

get_team()[source]

Returns team members

Calls

GET /shares/{share_id}/team

Returns

dictionary representing team members

send_invitation(id)[source]
set_destination_location(cloud, region)[source]

Sets destination location of this share to given cloud and location_id (region?)

Calls

POST /shares/{share_id}/destination/new

Parameters

  • cloud – cloud provider (e.g. AWS)

  • region – id of a region inside the cloud

set_source_location(location_id)[source]

Set the source of the share to location_id

Calls

POST /shares/{share_id}/source

Parameters

location_id – unique identifier of a source container

create_share()[source]

Creates a new share. This only works if authenticated as a provider

Calls

POST /shares

Returns

the Share object representing the share that was just created

get_share(share_id)[source]

Returns the Share with given share_id

Parameters

share_id – unique id of share

Returns

Share object

list_shares()[source]

Returns a list of share_ids that can be used with get_share

Calls

GET /shares

Returns

a list of share_ids

bobsled.BobsledException module

exception src.bobsled.BobsledException.BadCredentialsError(status, data)[source]

Bases: BobsledException

Exception raised in case of bad credentials (when Bobsled replies with a 401 or 403 HTML status)

exception src.bobsled.BobsledException.BobsledException(status, data)[source]

Bases: Exception

Error handling in Bobsled is done with exceptions. This class is the base of all exceptions raised by Bobsled.

property data

The data returned by the Bobsled API

property status

The status returned by the Bobsled API

exception src.bobsled.BobsledException.InternalServerError(status, data)[source]

Bases: BobsledException

Exception raised when something cannot be resolved in the internal server (when Bobsled replies with a 500 HTML status)

exception src.bobsled.BobsledException.UnknownObjectError(status, data)[source]

Bases: BobsledException

Exception raised when requested object is not found (when Bobsled replies with a 404 HTML status)

bobsled.utils module

src.bobsled.utils.flatten(contents, prefix='s3://rhizo-your-bucket-name')[source]

Helper function to flatten contents of source bucket

Parameters

  • contents – dictionary representing source bucket

  • prefix – root path of the bucket

Returns

list of complete file paths for all files in source bucket
